item.title: Dell introduces new network switches designed specifically for small businesses
item.description:
Dell has improved its networking solutions designed for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs). Their new X-series smart managed switches and expanded N-series family provide cost-effective, enterprise-grade network control with user-friendly simplicity. The Dell Networking X-Series includes web-managed 1 Gigabit Ethernet (GbE) and 10GbE switches with flexible configuration options. SMBs can benefit from advanced network management without specialized IT staff using step-by-step wizards and customizable dashboards. These features allow for quick and accurate configuration, calibration, and troubleshooting...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dell-introduces-new-network-switches-designed-specifically-for-small-businesses/
